title: Ana BeKhoach
text: Please, with the strength of the greatness of your right hand, free the pressed.
...Accept the pleasantness of your people; uphold us, purifty us, o awesome one!
...Please, mighty one, guard the seekers of your unity like the apple of an eye.
...Bless them, purify them; may the mrcy of your justice always accompany them.
...Holy stronghold, guide your flock with all of your goodness.
